context: Hello! What kind of movie are you in the mood to see today? I can make some general recommendations if you aren't sure. I watched Black Panther (2018) last night for the first time. It was pretty good.

resp: Oh, nice. I bet that was good. How about Iron Man (2008) ? It is one of my favorites out of the super hero genre.
